title: I Walked In On My Son
itunes:title: I Walked In On My Son
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a happily married woman in my mid-thirties and my husband and I have a son and a daughter. My son is 15 years old and my daughter is 8 years old. We have all been cooped up in the house, but my son has found a new way to keep himself occupied. I found out that he watches porn on his phone. He’s been up in his room, day and night and I was worried about him so I barged into his room the other day to check on him.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
